WaldiezNodeAgentType.description: Waldiez node agent type (alias for WaldiezAgentType).

WaldiezAgentCodeExecutionConfig.description: Code execution configuration. either a  {@link  WaldiezAgentCodeExecutionConfigDict }  or false (to disable)

WaldiezAgentTerminationCriterionOption.description: Termination criterion (if the termination type is "keyword").

WaldiezHandoffCondition.description: Waldiez Handoff condition A condition that can be evaluated by an LLM or against context variables.

WaldiezLLMBasedCondition.description: Waldiez LLM condition A condition that can be evaluated by an LLM.

WaldiezStringLLMCondition.description: Waldiez String LLM condition A static string prompt to be evaluated by an LLM.

WaldiezContextStrLLMCondition.description: Waldiez ContextStr LLM condition A `ContextStr` object with context variable placeholders that  will be substituted before being evaluated by an LLM.

WaldiezContextBasedCondition.description: Waldiez context condition A condition that can be evaluated against context variables.

WaldiezStringContextCondition.description: Waldiez String context condition  This condition checks if a named context variable exists and is truthy.

WaldiezExpressionContextCondition.description: Waldiez Expression context condition  This condition evaluates a ContextExpression against the context variables.

WaldiezTransitionTarget.description: The type of target in a handoff transition.

WaldiezRagUserRetrieveConfig.description: WaldiezRagUserRetrieveConfig Configuration for the RAG user.

WaldiezVectorDbConfig.description: WaldiezVectorDbConfig Configuration for the vector database.

WaldiezReasoningAgentReasonConfig.description: WaldiezReasoningAgentReasonConfig The configuration for the reasoning agent.

reasonConfigMethod.description: reasonConfigMethod The method used for reasoning. It can be "beam_search", "mcts", "lats", or "dfs".

reasonConfigAnswerApproach.description: reasonConfigAnswerApproach The approach used for answering. It can be "pool" or "best".

WaldiezCaptainAgentLibEntry.description: WaldiezCaptainAgentLibEntry Represents an entry in the agent library for the captain agent.

GroupChatSpeakerSelectionMethodOption.description: The method used to select the speaker in a group chat.

GroupChatSpeakerSelectionMode.description: The mode used to select the speaker in a group chat. It can be one "repeat" or "transition".

GroupChatSpeakerTransitionsType.description: GroupChatSpeakerTransitionsType The type of transitions for the speaker in a group chat. It can be "allowed" or "disallowed".

RAGQueryEngine.description: RAGQueryEngine The configuration for the RAG query engine used by the document agent. It can be one of the following:

WaldiezModelAPIType.description: WaldiezModelAPIType Represents the type of API used for the model.

WaldiezToolType.description: WaldiezToolType Represents the type of tool used in Waldiez.

WaldiezMessage.description: WaldiezMessage Represents a message in the Waldiez chat system.

WaldiezMessageType.description: WaldiezMessageType Represents the type of message used in the chat.

WaldiezChatLlmSummaryMethod.description: WaldiezChatLlmSummaryMethod Represents the method used to summarize the chat.

title: Waldiez Flow
description: The schema for a Waldiez Flow
